name: windStrengthLevel_setValue
description: This function is used to set the wind strength level of fans or air conditioners.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to set the wind strength level.

parameters.name: windStrengthLevel
parameters.description: The level of wind strength to set.
